name: uzdu
description: UZDU - universal zipper, downloader and uploader. Move files to/from zip, clouds (AWS, Azure), to HTTP PUT (e.g. Nexus) and to SSH

scripts.test:s3: npm run test:metadata && tsx src/uzdu.ts -d --aws my-bucket test/web
scripts.test:ssh: tsx src/uzdu.ts upload ssh --target my.example.com:22 --targetKey ~/.ssh/id_ed25519 test/web /opt/youroute.app/web/
scripts.test:azure: npm run test:metadata && tsx src/uzdu.ts upload azure -d --azure -- test/web
scripts.test:http:upload: tsx src/uzdu.ts upload http --dotenv --header "Authorization: Basic TOKEN=" website.zip https://nexus/repository/private-raw/dist/test-upload/website.zip
scripts.test:http:download: tsx src/uzdu.ts download http --dotenv --header "Authorization: Basic TOKEN=" https://nexus/repository/private-raw/dist/test-upload/website.zip website.zip
scripts.test:dist: npm run test:zip && npm run test:http:upload
